title: Waterball
description: This is a co-located game played on four tablets connected via LAN. It was developed in a team of six as part of my Bachelor's thesis.

title: OSRSBot
description: OSRSBot is a Python-based automation tool for controlling Android VMs via ADB (Android Debug Bridge) and VirtualBox. It provides a graphical user interface for managing multiple Android VMs.

title: Portfolio Website
description: This is my personal portfolio website which showcases my experience, skills and projects. It's developed using React and Typescript.

title: Autoclicker Pro
description: Autoclicker_Pro is an advanced autoclicking tool developed in Python, designed to automate clicking tasks with both preset and randomized intervals. It's built with a user-friendly interface and provides a range of customization options to suit different user needs.
